text: Bwe mutamutaasa (Nabbi Muhammad), mazima Katonda yamutaasa mu kiseera abakaafiiri bwe baamufulumya nga y’omu ku babiri, webaabeerera mu mpuku, mu kiseera weyagambira munne nti tonakuwala mazima Katonda ali wamu naffe, awo nno Katonda naamussaako obutebenkevubwe, era naamudduukirira neggye lye mutaalaba. E kigambo ky'abo abaakaafuwala n’akifuula ekya wansi, ssi nga ekigambo kya Katonda kyo kye kya waggulu, bulijjo Katonda ye nantakubwa ku mukono, mugoba nsonga
